expressions-desc: Enhances the parser with boolean algebra.
expressions-unidentified-token:
I got stuck at the following character:
$1I did not recognize the highlighted character. Try removing the character to see if that helps.
expressions-unclosed-paren:
I was expecting a closing parenthesis, because the highlighted parenthesis was not closed, but instead I reached the end of the expression:
$1Try adding a ')' at the end of the expression to see if that helps.
expressions-unexpected-token:
I got stuck at the following token:
$1I was expecting to see an operator followed by a value, but instead I got '$2'. $3
expressions-invalid-type:
I got stuck at the following location:
$1I was expecting to see a $2 at the highlighted location, because $4, but instead I got a $3.
expressions-unexpected-token-value-hint: Try adding a value $1 the highlighted token to see if that helps.
expressions-unexpected-token-operator-hi: Try adding an operator $1 the highlighted token to see if that helps.
expressions-unexpected-token-rightparen-: Try removing the highlighted parenthesis to see if that helps.
expressions-binary-left-type-exception: the operator `$1` only accepts a $2 as its left operand
expressions-binary-right-type-exception: the operator `$1` only accepts a $2 as its right operand
expressions-unary-type-exception: the operator `$1` only accepts a $2 as its operand
